label: HandleKnowLanguages
m: My favourite language is Python. I mainly it on a regular basis for data science and backend systems.
But, as many things, it's not a silver bullet. I've experience with Javascript, Java and PHP as well.
You need to pick the right tool for the job, right?

label: HandlePython
m: Of course, Python is my favourite language! :raised_hands:
I embraced the Zen of Python years ago. So powerful, elegant and flexible.

label: HandleJava
m: Java: proficient! In fact, Java EE is my second backend stack of choice.
Even now that it's not trendy anymore.

label: HandleJS
m: Yep! I developed a couple of medium-scale Single Page Applications using AngularJS/Angular.
But I can't keep up with the pace of new frameworks...
